TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataList Inherits WebControl
public ref class BaseDataList abstract : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl

summary.span: 充當資料清單控制項 (例如 和 ) 的抽象基底類別 (Base Class)。

span.span: Serves as the abstract base class for data listing controls, such as and .

summary.span: 此類別提供所有資料清單控制項通用的方法與屬性。

span.span: This class provides the methods and properties common to all data listing controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供所有資料清單控制項，這類的一般功能和。The class provides the common functionality for all data listing controls, such as and . 資料清單控制項用來顯示資料來源的記錄，例如控制項。A data listing control is used to display the records from a data source, such as a control. 每個資料清單控制項可以有唯一的顯示樣式和功能。Each data listing control can have a unique display style and capabilities. 因為類別是抽象的不會直接建立此類別的執行個體。Because the class is abstract, an instance of this class is not created directly. 相反地，資料清單控制項繼承的方法和屬性通用於所有的資料清單控制項，從這個類別。Instead, data listing controls inherit the methods and properties common to all data listing controls from this class. 您可以控制資料，藉由設定這個類別的特定屬性清單控制項的外觀。You can control the appearance of a data listing control by setting certain properties of this class. 若要判斷資料清單控制項的儲存格之間的間距數量，請設定屬性。To determine the amount of spacing between the cells of a data listing control, set the property. 若要判斷儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距數量，請設定屬性。To determine the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border, set the property. 您可以顯示的資料清單控制項，藉由設定個別的儲存格之間的框線屬性。You can display the border between the individual cells of a data listing control by setting the property. 中的資料清單控制項儲存格內容的水平對齊方式會受到屬性。The horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a data listing control is controlled by the property. 類別提供兩個屬性，以支援資料繫結。The class provides two properties to support data binding. 若要將資料繫結至任何實作的集合介面 (例如或)，或有介面，請使用屬性來指定資料來源。To bind data to any collection that implements the interface (such as or ), or the interface, use the property to specify the data source. 當您將設定屬性，您必須以手動方式撰寫程式碼來執行資料繫結。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding. 若要自動將資料繫結清單控制項至資料來源控制項所代表的資料來源，使用屬性並將其值設定為使用資料來源控制項的屬性。To automatically bind a data listing control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the property and set its value to the property of the data source control to use. 當您將設定屬性，資料清單控制項的自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。When you set the property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 因此，您不需要明確地呼叫方法。Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the method. 如果所指定的資料來源屬性包含多個資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至控制項的特定來源。If the data source specified by the property contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果您有物件使用多個資料表，您必須指定要繫結至控制項的資料表。For example, if you have a object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control. 指定資料來源之後，使用的資料來源繫結至控制項的方法。After you have specified the data source, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 類別包含資料清單控制項中儲存 （顯示為一個資料列） 的每一筆記錄的索引鍵欄位的集合。The class contains a collection that stores the key field of each record (displayed as a row) in a data listing control. 這可讓您與資料清單控制項，而不會顯示在控制項中儲存的索引鍵欄位。This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control. 索引鍵欄位常用更新查詢字串的一部分來修改資料來源中的特定記錄。The key field is commonly used as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source. 集合中所指定的欄位的值填滿屬性。The collection is filled with the values from the field specified by the property. 類別提供控制項中選取的項目變更時引發的事件。The class provides a event that is raised when the selected item in the control changes. 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式在引發事件時執行一組特定的指示。This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions when the event is raised.

span.para: 當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列成員：和。
When you inherit from , you must override the following members: and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件不會直接建立。A object is not created directly. 這個建構函式中初始化中定義的屬性在衍生類別的建構函式通常稱為類別。This constructor is commonly called in the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the class.

span.span: Notifies the server control that an element, either XML or HTML, was parsed, and adds the element to the server control's collection.

summary.span: 取得或設定要在控制項之 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control.

summary.span: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.

value.span: 字串，表示要在控制項之 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。

span.span: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control.

value.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要在控制項中 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control. 您指定的文字會提供控制項的描述的輔助技術裝置。The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the control. 若要在控制項中指定的 HTML 標題項目對齊方式，請使用屬性。To specify the alignment of the HTML caption element in the control, use the property. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項中 HTML 標題項目的水平或垂直位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control.

summary.span: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.

value.span: 其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定水平或垂直位置的 HTML 標題項目在控制項中的屬性。Use the property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control. 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices. 此屬性設定使用其中一種列舉值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未設定標題項目對齊。The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`Top`|標題項目與資料表的頂端對齊。The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| |`Bottom`|標題項目與資料表底端對齊。The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`Left`|標題項目與資料表的左邊緣對齊。The caption element is aligned with the left edge of the table.| |`Right`|標題項目與資料表的右邊緣對齊。The caption element is aligned with the right edge of the table.| 使用屬性來指定要在控制項中 HTML 標題項目中呈現的文字。Use the property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.

exception.span: 指定的型別不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellPadding { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellPadding
Public Overridable Property CellPadding As Integer
public: virtual property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellPadding : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距數 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制的儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填補量會新增至儲存格的四個邊。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 在相同的資料行的資料清單控制項中的所有資料格會共用同一個儲存格的寬度。All cells in the same column of a data listing control share the same cell width. 因此，如果相同的資料行中的其他資料格的內容超過一個資料格的內容，與邊框距離量適用於寬的儲存格。Therefore, if the content of one cell is longer than the content of other cells in the same column, the padding amount is applied to the widest cell. 資料行中的所有資料格也都設為這個儲存格的寬度。All other cells in the column are also set to this cell width. 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same height. 邊框距離會套用至資料列中最高的儲存格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the height of the tallest cell in the row. 資料列中的所有資料格會設為這個儲存格的高度。All other cells in the row are set to this cell height. 個別儲存格大小不能指定。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定儲存格內容和其框線之間的間距。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/CS/basedatalistcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/VB/basedatalistcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellSpacing { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellSpacing
Public Overridable Property CellSpacing As Integer
public: virtual property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CellSpacing : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定儲存格之間的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.

value.span: 儲存格之間的間距數 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between cells.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制資料清單控制項中相鄰儲存格之間的間距。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in a data listing control. 此間距已套用垂直和水平。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 儲存格間距是統一的整個資料清單控制項項目。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire data listing control. 不能指定每個資料列或資料行之間的個別儲存格間距。Individual cell spacing between each row or column cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定此屬性的值大於`0`並設定屬性值，這個值會顯示儲存格框線，間隔會顯示相鄰的資料格框線之間。If you set this property to a value greater than `0` and set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在此情況下，屬性控制的差距大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定相鄰儲存格之間的間距。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the spacing between adjacent cells. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/CS/basedatalistcellpaddingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListCellPadding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListCellPadding/VB/basedatalistcellpaddingvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 物件，其包含資料清單控制項內子控制項的集合。

span.span: Gets a object that contains a collection of child controls in a data listing control.

value.span: ，包含資料清單控制項內子控制項的集合。

span.span: A that contains a collection of child controls in a data listing control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用来管理的資料清單控制項中所包含的子控制項集合。Use the collection to manage the child controls contained in a data listing control. 您可以將控制項加入、 移除控制項，或逐一查看集合中的伺服器控制項。You can add controls, remove controls, or iterate through the server controls in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入控制項以集合。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a control to the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListControls#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListControls/CS/basedatalistcontrolscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListControls#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListControls/VB/basedatalistcontrolsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，使用或不使用指定的資料來源建立資料清單控制項的控制項階層架構。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates the control hierarchy for the data listing control with or without the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用來建立其控制項階層架構在衍生類別的 helper 方法。The method is a helper method used by a derived class to create its control hierarchy.

span.para: 當您建立資料清單控制項衍生自，您必須覆寫方法用來建立衍生的資料清單控制項的控制項階層架構。
When you create a data listing control that derives from , you must override the method to create the control hierarchy for the derived data listing control.

A initialized to .

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBind() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub DataBind ()
public: override void DataBind();
override this.DataBind : unit -> unit

summary.span: 將控制項和它的所有子控制項繫結至指定的資料來源。

span.span: Binds the control and all its child controls to the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法所指定的資料來源繫結資料清單控制項的屬性。Use the method to bind the data source specified by the property to the data listing control. 根據繫結資料清單控制項的資料來源，資料來源中的資訊會顯示在資料清單控制項。By binding the data source to a data listing control, the information in the data source is displayed in a data listing control. 方法通常也用來同步處理的資料來源和資料清單控制項之後會更新資料來源中的資訊。The method is also commonly used to synchronize the data source and a data listing control after information in the data source is updated. 這可讓資料來源，也會更新在資料清單控制項中的任何變更。This allows any changes in the data source to also be updated in a data listing control. 如果指定的資料清單控制項的資料來源屬性，您不需要呼叫方法。If the data source for the data listing control is specified by the property, you do not need to call the method. ASP.NET 會呼叫這個方法，會自動以指定的資料來源控制項繫結至資料清單控制項。ASP.NET calls this method automatically to bind the specified data source control to the data listing control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來將資料來源繫結控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to bind a data source to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 屬性指定的資料來源內的索引鍵欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets the key field in the data source specified by the property.

value.span: 指定之資料來源中索引鍵欄位的名稱。

span.span: The name of the key field in the data source specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定資料來源中的索引鍵欄位由屬性。Use the property to specify the key field in the data source indicated by the property. 指定的欄位會用來填入集合。The specified field is used to populate the collection. 這可讓您與資料清單控制項，而不會顯示在控制項中儲存的索引鍵欄位。This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control. 索引鍵欄位常用的處理常式中的事件，例如`ItemCommand`或`DeleteCommand`，若要修改資料來源中的特定記錄更新查詢字串的一部分。The key field is commonly used in a handler for an event, such as `ItemCommand` or `DeleteCommand`, as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source. 索引鍵的欄位可協助識別要修改的適當記錄更新查詢字串。The key field helps the update query string identify the appropriate record to modify. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定資料來源的索引鍵欄位。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the key field for the data source. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/CS/basedatalistdatakeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/VB/basedatalistdatakeysvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得 物件，其將每個資料錄的索引鍵值儲存在資料清單控制項中。

span.span: Gets a object that stores the key values of each record in a data listing control.

value.span: ，將每個資料錄的索引鍵值儲存在資料清單控制項中。

span.span: A that stores the key values of each record in a data listing control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用存取 （顯示為一個資料列） 的每一筆記錄的索引鍵值在資料清單控制項中的集合。Use the collection to access the key values of each record (displayed as a row) in a data listing control. 這可讓您與資料清單控制項，而不會顯示在控制項中儲存的索引鍵欄位。This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control. 此集合中所指定的欄位的值會自動填滿屬性。This collection is automatically filled with the values from the field specified by the property. 索引鍵欄位常用的處理常式中的事件，例如`ItemCommand`或`DeleteCommand`，若要修改資料來源中的特定記錄更新查詢字串的一部分。The key field is commonly used in a handler for an event, such as `ItemCommand` or `DeleteCommand`, as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source. 索引鍵的欄位可協助識別要修改的適當記錄更新查詢字串。The key field helps the update query string identify the appropriate record to modify. 如需有關如何使用 ASP.NET 存取資料的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。For more information on accessing data with ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷要刪除之資料錄的索引鍵欄位的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the value of the key field for the record being deleted. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/CS/basedatalistdatakeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListDataKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataKeys/VB/basedatalistdatakeysvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定多個成員的資料來源內特定的資料成員，以繫結至資料清單控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets the specific data member in a multimember data source to bind to a data listing control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定多個成員的資料來源的繫結到清單控制項的成員。Use the property to specify a member from a multimember data source to bind to the list control. 例如，如果您有一個以上的資料表中指定的資料來源屬性，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至資料清單控制項的資料表。For example, if you have a data source with more than one table specified in the property, use the property to specify which table to bind to a data listing control. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的資料表中繫結至物件控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify which table in a object to bind to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListDataMember#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataMember/CS/basedatalistdatamembercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListDataMember#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListDataMember/VB/basedatalistdatamembervb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定來源，包含用來填入控制項內項目的值清單。

span.span: Gets or sets the source containing a list of values used to populate the items within the control.

value.span: 或 ，包含用來提供資料給這個控制項的值集合。

span.span: An or that contains a collection of values used to supply data to this control.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定繫結至資料清單控制項的值的來源。Use the property to specify the source of values to bind to a data listing control. 資料來源必須實作的集合介面 (例如， ，或) 或繫結至控制項的介面衍生自類別。A data source must be a collection that implements either the interface (such as , , or ) or the interface to bind to a control derived from the class. 當您將設定屬性，您必須以手動方式撰寫程式碼來執行資料繫結。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 如果所指定的資料來源屬性包含多個資料來源，請使用屬性來指定要繫結至控制項的特定來源。If the data source specified by the property contains multiple sources of data, use the property to specify the specific source to bind to the control. 例如，如果您有物件使用多個資料表，您必須指定要繫結至控制項的資料表。For example, if you have a object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control. 指定資料來源之後，使用的資料來源繫結至控制項的方法。After you have specified the data source, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 或者，您可以使用屬性自動繫結至資料來源控制項所代表的資料來源。Alternately, you can use the property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control. 當您將設定屬性，資料清單控制項的自動繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。When you set the property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 您不需要撰寫程式碼，明確地呼叫方法。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 如果兩個指定的值屬性和屬性，ASP.NET 不能夠解析資料來源和擲回例外狀況。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an exception is thrown. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定資料來源繫結至控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the data source to bind to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGrid Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGrid Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

The data source is of an invalid type.

exception.span: 資料來源必須為 ，或是實作 或 介面。

span.span: The data source must be or implement either the or the interface.

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源控制項的 屬性，資料清單控制項應該用這個控制項來擷取其資料來源。

span.span: Gets or sets the property of the data source control that the data listing control should use to retrieve its data source.

value.span: 指派給資料來源控制項的程式設計識別項。

span.span: The programmatic identifier assigned to the data source control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性來存取資料清單控制項應該用來擷取其資料來源的資料來源控制項的屬性。Use the property to access the property of the data source control that the data listing control should use to retrieve its data source. 資料來源所參考的控制項屬性可以是任何控制項，可實作介面。The data source control referenced by the property can be any control that implements the interface. 在資料清單控制項的參考，與相同的命名容器中或父控制項的資料清單控制項中，必須存在資料來源控制項。The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the data listing control that references it, or in a parent control of the data listing control. 當您指定這個屬性的值時，清單控制項會自動將資料繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。When you specify a value for this property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control. 您不需要撰寫程式碼，明確地呼叫方法。You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the method. 或者，您可以使用屬性來指定繫結至資料清單控制項的值的來源。Alternately, you can use the property to specify the source of values to bind to a data listing control. 資料來源必須是集合，實作介面 (例如， ，或) 或繫結至控制項的介面衍生自類別。The data source must be a collection that implements the interface (such as , , or ) or the interface to bind to a control derived from the class. 當您將設定屬性，您必須以手動方式撰寫程式碼來執行資料繫結。When you set the property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding. 如果兩個指定的值屬性和屬性，ASP.NET 不能夠解析資料來源和擲回例外狀況。If values are specified for both the property and the property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an exception is thrown. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

exception.span: 無法解析資料來源，因為同時為 屬性和 屬性指定了值。

span.span: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the property and the property.

summary.span: 確認在呼叫 方法之前，資料清單控制項是否需要資料繫結，以及是否已指定有效的資料來源控制項。

span.span: Verifies that the data listing control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定的值屬性，ASP.NET 會自動將資料繫結清單所指定的資料來源控制項的控制項。When you specify a value for the property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control. 當 ASP.NET 會執行資料繫結控制項時，它會呼叫第一次，並確定控制項具有未繫結資料，有效的資料來源控制項所實作的方法介面指定其屬性。When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the method first to verify that the control has not already been bound to data and that a valid data source control that implements the interface is specified for its property. 然後方法會呼叫方法。The method then calls the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定是否要顯示資料清單控制項的儲存格之間的框線。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the border between the cells of a data listing control is displayed.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，指定是否要顯示資料清單控制項的儲存格之間的框線。Use the property to specify whether the border between the cells of a data listing control is displayed. 此屬性設為其中一個列舉值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|顯示沒有資料格框線。No cell border is displayed.| |`Horizontal`|只上限和下限資料清單控制項中的資料格會顯示框線。Only the upper and lower borders of the cells in a data listing control are displayed.| |`Vertical`|僅左邊和右邊資料清單控制項中的資料格顯示框線。Only the left and right borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| |`Both`|顯示所有的資料清單控制項中的資料格的框線。All borders of the cells in a data listing control are displayed.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以資料繫結控制項中顯示水平和垂直格線。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display both the horizontal and vertical gridlines in a data-bound control. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListGridLines#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListGridLines/CS/basedatalistgridlinescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListGridLines#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListGridLines/VB/basedatalistgridlinesvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a data listing control within its container.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定資料清單控制項在其容器內的水平對齊。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of a data listing control within its container. 此屬性設為其中一個列舉值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|水平對齊未設定。The horizontal alignment is not set.| |`Left`|清單控制項的資料是靠左對齊，其容器內。The data listing control is left-aligned within its container.| |`Center`|清單控制項的資料會在容器中置中。The data listing control is centered within its container.| |`Right`|清單控制項的資料會靠右對齊其容器內。The data listing control is right-aligned within its container.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的資料繫結控制項的水平對齊。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the data-bound control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性由衍生類別 (例如和) 來判斷是否繫結至 ASP.NET 版本 2.0 的資料來源控制項的資料繫結控制項。The property is used by derived classes (such as and ) to determine whether the data-bound control is bound to an ASP.NET version 2.0 data source control.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結來時，會引發事件控制項。The event is raised when data is bound to the control. 這個方法會通知控制項，來執行與它相關聯的任何資料繫結邏輯。This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 在其中一個基底資料來源識別屬性變更時呼叫，以將資料繫結控制項重新繫結至其資料。

span.span: Called when one of the base data source identification properties is changed, to rebind the data-bound control to its data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫方法來重新繫結至其資料的資料繫結控制項時， ，或屬性變更值在分頁之後事件。The method is called to rebind the data-bound control to its data when the , , or property changes values after the page's event.

exception.span: 嘗試在控制項的資料繫結 (Data Binding) 階段變更此屬性值。

span.span: An attempt was made to change the property value during the data-binding phase of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會通知資料繫結控制項已變更基礎資料來源和控制項應該重新繫結，以及應該執行任何必要的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and any necessary work should be performed. 一般而言，資料來源檢視的屬性已經變更時呼叫方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source view has changed. 類別集屬性設`true`當就會引發事件。The class sets the property to `true` when the event is raised. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料清單控制項之間張貼至伺服器 中選取不同的項目時，會引發事件。The event is raised when a different item is selected in a data listing control between posts to the server. 方法可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式。The method allows you to create a custom handler for the event. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料清單控制項是否需要繫結至其指定的資料來源。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data listing control needs to bind to its specified data source.

value.span: 如果控制項需要繫結至資料來源，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會使用屬性來判斷控制項是否需要呼叫繫結至其指定的資料來源的方法。The control uses the property to determine whether the control needs to call the method to bind to its specified data source. 每次`set`存取子上呼叫，則，或屬性來變更資料來源之後已呼叫方法，ASP.NET 會自動設定的值屬性設`true`。Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the , the , or the property to change the data source after the method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the property to `true`. 值屬性也設為`true`當呼叫方法。The value of the property is also set to `true` when the method is called. ASP.NET 會自動設定的值屬性，以`false`之後立即已呼叫方法。ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the property to `false` immediately after the method has been called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料清單控制項之間張貼至伺服器 中選取不同的項目時，會引發事件。The event is raised when a different item is selected in a data listing control between posts to the server. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何提供的事件處理常式事件以宣告方式。The following code example demonstrates how to provide an event handler for the event declaratively. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged/CS/basedatalistselectedindexchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged/VB/basedatalistselectedindexchangedvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何提供的事件處理常式事件以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to provide an event handler for the event programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2/CS/basedatalistselectedindexchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BaseDataListSelectedIndexChanged2/VB/basedatalistselectedindexchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性會指出 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0; 否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指示如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料清單控制項是否能夠以可存取格式呈現其標頭。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data listing control renders its header in an accessible format.

summary.span: 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。

span.span: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.

value.span: 如果控制項以可存取格式呈現其標頭，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control renders its header in an accessible format; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定資料清單控制項是否呈現其標頭，以可存取格式。Use the property to specify whether the data listing control renders its header in an accessible format. 這個屬性可讓協助技術裝置的使用者更容易存取控制項。This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices. 根據預設，這個屬性的值是`false`與控制項的標頭資料格標籤之間轉譯``和``。By default, the value of this property is `false` and the header for the control is rendered between cell tags `` and ``. 如果這個屬性的值是`true`，該控制項的標頭呈現資料表標頭資料格標籤之間``和``。If the value of this property is `true`, the header for the control is rendered between table header cell tags `` and ``. 颾魤 ㄛ`scope="col"`屬性加入至資料表標頭，指定資料行中的所有資料格套用標頭。In addition, a `scope="col"` attribute is added to the table header to specify that the header applies to all the cells in the column. 預設轉譯``保留項目，以水平方式轉譯的文字為粗體和置中對齊。The default rendering of the `` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally. 開發人員可以覆寫行為``項目使用階層式樣式表 (CSS)。Developers can override the behavior of the `` element using a cascading style sheet (CSS). 不過，建立可存取網頁時，建議不要使用樣式表。However, requiring the use of style sheets is discouraged when creating accessible Web pages. 針對資料清單控制項，例如控制項和控制項，繼承自類別，您可以設定屬性以宣告方式或以程式設計的方式。For data listing controls, such as the control and the control, that inherit from the class, you can set the property declaratively or programmatically. 如果您設定屬性以程式設計方式設定後再繫結資料與方法。If you set the property programmatically, set it before binding data with the method.
